item.title: Bangalore to Kabini Wildlife Safari â€“ Route, Stay Options & Travel Guide
item.description: A trip from Bangalore to Kabini is one of the best short getaways for wildlife lovers, nature enthusiasts, couples, and families. Kabini, located on the banks of the Kabini River and close to the famous Nagarahole National Park, is a paradise for those who love forests, wildlife spotting, peaceful resorts, and photography. This guide gives you a simple, detailed, and practical plan to help you ma
